data.event: Safety stressed on St. Patrick's Day.

event.title: the past five years, 851 people lost

data.event: “Statistics from the National Highway Traffic Administration show that over the past five years, 851 people lost their lives in motor vehicle crashes during the St. Patrick’s Day holiday.

event.title: Never serve alcoholic beverages to individuals under 21 years

data.event: Never serve alcoholic beverages to individuals under 21 years of age.
